title: Parliament AI leads split on banning pornification apps
summary_full: MEPs are toying with amending the AI omnibus to clearly outlaw nudification apps after Elon Musk's Grok was used to digitally undress women and children
summary_public: MEPs are toying with amending the AI omnibus to clearly outlaw nudification apps after Elon Musk's Grok was used to digitally undress women and children
